notes: Version 1.2.2 - Enhanced Text Communication & Rich Media Support. Major new features: File upload system supporting images, videos, audio, documents, archives, and executables up to 20MB with automatic media compression. Expanded GIF picker with pagination (up to 3 pages) and personal GIF favorites - save any GIF with hover actions for quick reuse. Discord-style @mentions with autocomplete, visual highlighting, taskbar notifications, and channel badges. Comprehensive backend includes file storage, compression services (Sharp for images, FFmpeg for video/audio), saved GIFs database, and real-time mention parsing. All features maintain the app's sleek design language with fluid animations and responsive UI. Zero breaking changes - fully backward compatible with 1.2.1.
